project_descr: BARRIER REMOVAL TO THE COST-EFFECTIVE DEVELOPMENT AND IMPLEMENTATION OF ENERGY EFFICIENCY STANDARDS AND LABELING PROJECT (BRESL)

outputs.output_descr:
The goal of the project is the reduction of GHG emissions in
selected Asian countries (i.e. BRESL countries) by
accelerating the adoption and implementation of energy
standards and labels (ES&L) in Asia.
